Description.Text: Location This adults only hotel is located 300 m from the sandy beach, within easy reach from bars, restaurants, bus stops, supermarkets, city centre and tourist information. The closest cities are Palma De Mallorca (17 km), Palmanova (3 km) and Santa Ponsa (9 km). Accessible from the hotel: the Western Water Park (3 km), the PMI airport (25 km), Pirates Adventure (700 m), discos (300 m) and House of Katmandu (700 m). Facilities The hotel was built in 1989. Guests are welcomed at the accommodation, which has a total of 656 rooms. A lobby and a reception are available to travellers. Individual storeys are accessible via the lift or stairs. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a currency exchange service, a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, multilingual staff and medical assistance. Wireless internet access (no extra charge) is available to guests. Shopping facilities are also available. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. The standard features of most rooms include a balcony. Extra beds can be requested. All rooms feature a tea/coffee station, a telephone, a TV and a safe. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. A hairdryer is also available. The establishment offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment An outdoor pool is available for travellers to enjoy in their free time. A waterslide offers fun for all ages. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. There is also a poolside snack bar. Those who wish to enjoy an active holiday can take advantage of a gym, or for a fee, golf. In addition, golf and horse riding are offered by third-party operators. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme and a disco. Meals The accommodation offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
